name: Go Troll or Get Trolled
description:
Endless runner created during AprilisJam 2017 in Lodz.

Your goal is to get higher score than your opponent but this game will not let you get it so easily... Be carefull about random bonuses able to help you or just the opposite :)

Authors:

Adrian Majzer

Tomasz Gabryelewicz

Bartosz Kluchciński

Natalia Wylezińska

Jakub Pietrzak

Lodz University of Technology, Faculty of Technical Physics, Information Technology and Applied Mathematics
